dialogues.text: I'm what they call a Celestial, sweetheart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians STOP behind him, astounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Celestial. Like a... god?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Small `g', son. At least on the days I'm feeling humble as Drax.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He LAUGHS and walks up the stairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego SAUNTERS with Quill, Gamora, Drax, and Mantis, throug the enormous open doors, toward huge DIORAMAS lining eith side of the palace, like cosmic Stations of the Cross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This form you see before you is only an extension of who I truly am. I don't know where I came from, exactly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DIORAMAS around them begin to ANIMATE: In the first, FLICKERING BRAIN COMPOSED OF POLYCHROMATIC LIGHT FLOATS i space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The first thing I remember is flickering, adrift in the cosmos - utterly and entirely alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flickering brain pulls cosmic dust and rocks into its ingesting them, GROWING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I fed on the matter around me like plankton. I grew smarter and stronger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hard metal shell forms around the brain, with channels running through for his energy to flow like rivers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I formed a sheathe to protect myself from the elements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego continues developing outward from the shell, growing planet, then its beautiful landscapes and structures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And continued building from there, layer by layer, the very planet you walk on now. I built the spires reaching up to the sky and the tunnels burrowing into its depths.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I was no ant to be fulfilled solely by labor. I wanted more. I desired... meaning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the core shell - the Self Chamber - the flickering bra floats, alone, perhaps sad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There must be some life out there in the universe besides just me, I thought, and I set myself to task with finding it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The brain grows a SKELETAL FRAMEWORK OF LIGHT up from the self chamber and to the surface of the planet. He pulls molecules around this shape to create his "human" self.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I created what I imagined biological life might be like, down to the most minute detail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you make a penis?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he's a planet, how did he make a baby with your mother? He would smush her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't need to hear about how my parents, you know -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? My father would tell me the story of impregnating my mother every winter solstice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's disgusting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was beautiful. You earthers have hang-ups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Drax, I've got a penis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not half bad. I've also got pain receptors, a digestive system, and all the accompanying junk. I wanted to experience what it truly meant to be human as I set out amongst the stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In another DIORAMA, Ego explores various uninhabited and barren planets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I visited thousands of planets over thousands of years, one barren husk after the next until I found what I sought...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego stares down at a CUTE ALIEN CHILD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Life. I was not alone in this universe after all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego reminisces: wistful? Sad? It's hard to tell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When did you meet my mother?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not long after.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego turns toward the last set of DIORAMAS. They show Mere and Ego kissing and Ego with his hand on Meredith's pregn belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was with Meredith that I experienced love for the first time. I called her my river lily. And from that love, Peter, you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the final DIORAMA we PUSH IN on the belly and see, ins the womb, VERY young Peter Quill, a fetus, himself encase light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill looks up in amazement - this story is the story of himself. And Ego gazes at Quill with adoration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I searched for you for so long. When I heard a man from earth held an Infinity Stone in his hand without dying, I knew you must be the son of the woman I loved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego puts his hand on Quill. Quill wants to believe, but h can't quite let it go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you loved her why did you leave her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ravagers' massive ship FLOATS in space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't do this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ravagers LAUGH as they DRAG Tullk across the floor while STRUGGLES to get free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is mutiny! Mutiny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They shove Tullk into a cylindrical room as a glass door CLOSES on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He continues SCREAMING and SLAMMING ON THE GLASS, but we barely hear him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Half-Nut smiles and presses a button. The outside of the compartment OPENS so that Tullk is SUCKED INTO SPACE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tullk FLOATS AWAY, opening his mouth to scream, but he ca His FACE AND BODY SWELL QUICKLY and he EXPIRES there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we CURL AROUND his lifeless body, we REVEAL the countl other CORPSES of Ravagers loyal to Yondu, leading like br crumbs toward nothing at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu watches this, helplessly. He's in a chair, his hand tied behind him. He's a wreck, his headpiece destroyed, w hanging from a gap in his head where the fin used to be. sees the mutineers grab the innocent Oblo, DRAGGING HIM t the same fate as Tullk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cap'n, help me! Cap'n?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu drops his head in shame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're the one what kilt those men by leading `em down the wrong path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He PUNCHES Yondu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you're weak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He PUNCHES him again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And stupid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Monstrous Ravager turns towards the Ravagers, who lis rapt and vengeful. Nebula leans calmly against a wall, watching. Kraglin watches too, seemingly concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time for the Ravagers to once again rise to glory with a new Cap'n... TASERFACE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ravagers SHOUT IN APPROVAL. Taserface throws his arms in glory - when he hears SNICKERING. He stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He and the other Ravagers turn and see Rocket, also in a chair with his arms secured behind him, GIGGLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. Your name is... it's `Taserface'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you... shoot tasers out of your face?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's metaphorical!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface thinks. Time for a new answer:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a name what strikes fear in anyone what hears it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?... Okay, sure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface screams at him, SPIT FLYING EVERYWHERE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shut up! You're next!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface goes back to Yondu, bringing out his blade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Udonta, I been waiting to do this for a long ti -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again they hear SNICKERING. Rocket is burying his mouth i his chest, TRYING TO STOP FROM CRACKING UP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. I just keep imagining you waking up one morning, looking in the mirror, and, in all seriousness, saying `You know what would be a really kickass name? Taserface!'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula smirks. The Ravagers are TRYING NOT TO LAUGH. Rock can't stop LAUGHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was your second choice?! Scrotum Hat?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ravagers all BUST OUT LAUGHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: New plan. We're killing you first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface SHOVES HIM BACK, ready to plunge the knife in h Rocket's smile disappears. He stares at Taserface with de eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, dying is certainly better than having to live an entire life as a moronic shitbag who thinks `Taserface' is a cool name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface goes to stab him, when -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's enough killing for today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface turns toward her, irritated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought you were the biggest sadist in the galaxy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was when Daddy was paying my bills. The Priestess wants to kill the fox herself. And he -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - has bounties on his head in at least twelve Kree provinces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface glares at her. It's obvious he's considering attacking her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I assure you, I am not as easy a mark as an old man without his magic stick or a talking woodland beast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface decides not to risk it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want ten percent of the take, and a couple more things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula is TRYING OUT A BRAND NEW HAND as Kraglin leads he through this hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got a whole box of hands if that one don't work out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think them Kree is gonna execute the Cap'n?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Kree consider themselves merciful. It will be painless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin comes to an open doorway beside a huge DOCKING BA and an M-SHIP decked out with lots of weapons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there it is, best ship we got. The location of Ego's planet's in the nav. We'll wire you the ten percent when we's paid. What you gonna do with your share?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula stops at the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As a child my father would have Gamora and me battle one another in `training.' Every time my sister prevailed my father would replace a piece of me with machinery, claiming he wanted me to be her equal. But she won, again and again and again. Never once refraining. Because of them, I am this. So after I murder my sister, I will buy a warship with every conceivable instrument of death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will hunt my father like a dog and I will tear him apart slowly, piece by piece, until he knows some semblance of the profound and unceasing pain I know every single day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin stares at her, weirded-out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... I was talking about, like, a pretty necklace. Or a nice hat. Something that'll make the other girls go `oooooo, that's nice.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula gives him a look of pure death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, uh, happy trails.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill looks up at a GIANT SCULPTURE of his mother. He is upset. Ego is behind him, watching him, sadly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mother told everyone my father was from the stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill turns to look at his father, somewhat accusatory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She had brain cancer - so everyone thought she was delusional.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego looks sad, ashamed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. I'd love to believe all of this, I really would - but you left the most wonderful woman ever, to die alone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego has tears in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't want to leave your mother, Peter. But if I don't return regularly to this planet, and the light within, this form will wither and perish --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why didn't you come back?! Why'd you send Yondu, a criminal, of all people, to fetch me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I loved your mother, Peter! I couldn't stand to set foot on an earth where she wasn't living! You can't imagine what that's like!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know exactly what that's like! I had to watch her die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego stops, seeming to hear his son.   He touches him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over the millions and millions of years of my existence I have made many mistakes, Peter. But you're not one of them. Please give me the chance to be the father she would want me to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill looks at him, vulnerable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are so many things I need to teach you. This planet, and the light within... they are a part of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego takes Quill's hands in his own, gently, putting them the correct position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me your hands, son.    Here. Hold them like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill holds his hands apart.   Ego steps back, holding hi hands in the same way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now close your eyes and concentrate. Take your brain to the center of the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill concentrates. He holds his hand out.    A white lig emanates from it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light disappears as quickly as it came.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes - it's okay. Just relax. Concentrate. You can do it. Bring it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill concentrates and the LIGHT, once again, bursts up f the palms of his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, yes, now - shape it -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego shows him, pulling in the molecules around him, so th the light itself forms into the shape of a ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Feel the energy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill tries to pull molecules into the ball. And, little little, they come, and the ball glows brighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill laughs. Ego is JOYOUS. He almost looks as if he's g to break down in tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're home, Peter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego cups his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill, smiling, THROWS him the ball. Ego LAUGHS. He inspe the cosmic ball of light, and he throws it back to Quill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill LAUGHS, catching it, and throws it back.   Ego move back further.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Ego and Quill continue tossing the ball back and fort there, LAUGHING, a friendly father and son game of catch the middle of a palace courtyard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax and Mantis sit here, soaking in the sun and gazing a the lush, flowing hills, like something an alien Maxfield Parrish would paint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you get here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego found me in my larva state, orphaned on my homeworld. He raised me by hand, and kept me as his own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you're a pet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People usually want cute pets. Why would Ego want a hideous one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am hideous?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're horrifying to look at, yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis seems sad about this.    Drax notice this, feels b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it is a good thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When you are ugly and someone loves you, you know they love you for who you are. Beautiful people never know who to trust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, then I am certainly grateful to be ugly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poor Gamora. She can never trust anyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax nods and stares out at spattered patches of water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those pools remind me of a time I took my daughter to visit the Forgotten Lakes on my homeworld. She was like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Disgusting?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Innocent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax stares out at them without expression.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly, Mantis TOUCHES his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And, as she does, TEARS INSTANTLY FLOW DOWN HER CHEEKS. S stares with Drax at the hills. They feel the sadness together: she cries while he's stoic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have never met anyone like you, or your friends. You are filled with such... love. It is a thing I did not know existed, not like this, and I think... I think it may be the very finest of all things. It both hurts and soothes the heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks at Drax. There is something she wants to say, b she is torn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax, there is something I must

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax and Mantis turn to see her behind them. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am learning many things. Like I am a pet and ugly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not ugly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax, confused, points at Mantis, as if her ugliness prov itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis, can you show us where we'll be staying? I'm getting eye-strain in this place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis nods, yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora, Drax, and Mantis walk across the sunset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are there no other beings on this planet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The planet IS Ego. A dog would not invite a flea to live on his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you're not a flea?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a flea with a purpose. I help him sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora curls around Mantis, cutting her off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What were you about to say to Drax before I walked out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis looks around, worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora and Drax share a look: why is she so scared? Manti moves on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your quarters are this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket HITS THE GROUND, hard.   Yondu LANDS equally hard the ground beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look up to see Taserface, Gef the Ravager and an OBT RAVAGER locking the cell door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll deliver you to the Kree in the morning. Neither one of you gonna last much longer after that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket crawls toward them as they walk away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, Taserface. See you later, Taserface. Hey, Taserface, tell the other guys we said hi, Taserface!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface glances back, perturbed, as he disappears aroun the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface, Gef, and Obtuse come around the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the little plant? Can I smash it with a rock?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Gef! It's too adorable to kill. Bring it to the tailor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu and Rocket settle.   Yondu looks like a beaten man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No offense, but your employees are a bunch of jerks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was a Kree battle-slave for twenty years when Stakar freed me. He offered me a place in the Ravagers. Said all I needed to do was adhere to the code. But I was young and greedy and stupid - like you stealing those batteries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was mostly Drax.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me and Stakar, and the other captains - we weren't so different from you and your friends. The only family I ever had. But I broke the code. They exiled me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These ones here are the ones who followed - of course they're jerks. Which is what I deserve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down, drama queen. You might deserve this, but I don't. We gotta get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Quill?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Went off with his old man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu looks concerned. Rocket stares at him, picking this

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. It's a day for dumbass names.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu SNICKERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You smiled and for a second I got a warm feeling, but then it was ruined by those disgusting-ass teeth. Ever heard of floss?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu's smile disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're like a professional asshole or - ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty much a pro. Why didn't you deliver Quill to Ego like you promised?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was skinny, could fit into places we couldn't. Good for thieving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket nods, GRUMBLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got an idea on how to get outta here. But we're gonna need your little friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Groot is wearing a tiny Ravager uniform. He reacts t clothes like a cat, struggling to take them off but unabl Ravagers are gathered around him, drunk and LAUGHING. The are CHANTING "MASCOT."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lil' feller's all worked up! Needs a drank!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Retch POURS ALCOHOL on him. The Ravagers LAUGH MORE as ot POUR DRINKS on him as well. Groot SCREAMS at them, furiou but helpless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lookit how cute it is when it's all riled up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Goddang precious!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot, in shadows, MOPES down the hallway, looking traumatized. His clothes are torn and he's soaked in alco

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he passes the cell, he hears -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, twig. C'mere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot sees Yondu and Rocket looking at him in the cell. H steps toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, man. What'd they do to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you wanna help us get outta here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot NODS.   Rocket looks unsure. Yondu speaks slowly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something I need you to get, and bring back to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot NODS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the Cap'n's quarters, there's a prototype fin, like the thing I wore on my head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot NODS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a drawer next to the bunk. It's inside that. It's red. You got it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot NODS EMPHATICALLY and DARTS OFF to get it.   Yondu at Rocket, pleased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket looks more than a bit uncertain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Groot CREEPS into this dark room.    DRUNKEN RAVAGER sprawled everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spots a bureau.    A drawer is half open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His face lights up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Groot stands outside of the cell, beaming, holding A PAIR OF SHORTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my underwears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I was pretty sure he didn't know what you were talking about. You have to explain it more careful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right. It's a prototype fin -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot is back in front of the cell, holding a wriggling ORLONI in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's an orloni. It's a fin, Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You explain it this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket starts to speak -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot looks hopeful, holding out a CYBERNETIC EYE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Vorker's eye. He takes it out when he sleeps. Go look again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot starts to SLINK OFF -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But leave the eye here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket CAN HARDLY SPEAK he finds it so funny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gonna wake up tomorrow and he's not gonna know where his eye is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot is DRAGGING a LARGE PIECE OF FURNITURE to the cell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a desk. We told you it was this big.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket shows him how small it is with his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot makes a face like "Oh!" as if NOW he gets it. It's coming together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot is holding a SEVERED TOE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me you guys have a refrigerator somewhere with a bunch of severed human toes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu SUBTLY SHAKES HIS HEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, then let's just agree to never discuss this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu RIPS the Ravager patch off his jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The drawer you want to open. Has this symbol on it, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot takes it. He looks at Yondu and NODS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then, slowly, HE PLACES IT ON TOP OF HIS HEAD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He thinks you want him to wear it as a hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not what I said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot takes it off his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's relieved that you don't want him to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hates hats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On anyone, not just himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One minute you think someone has a weird-shaped head. The next minute, it's just because you realize part of that head is a hat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why you don't like hats?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is an important conversation right now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.   Let's try again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface is SNORING and SLOBBERING in his bed. We see th Ravager Patch tossed up onto the bed beside him. Then Groot's vines GROW up the bed, and he pulls himself up be the sleeping giant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot clasps the Ravager patch in his hand and looks fearfully around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spots the Ravager symbol on a night stand drawer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stares at the symbol in his hand, then at the drawer, at the symbol, and then at the drawer again, and then one more time for good measure -- he wants to be very, very s they're the same.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He creeps carefully towards the drawer, GROWING his vines to grab the handle and PULL IT slowly open...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He peers inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beside some writing instruments and a tin of candies, the lies a RED FIN, taller and more shark-like than Yondu's current model. Groot smiles hugely, picking up -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE TIN OF CANDIES! He's found it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That ain't it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot SWIRLS to see KRAGLIN, BACKLIT IN THE DOORWAY, LOOM OVER HIM, intimidating as hell. And CUT TO --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The RED FIN PLOPS DOWN at Yondu's feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu and Rocket look up to see Kraglin, holding Groot. H stares at the ground -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't mean to do a mutiny. (pause, then, sadly) They killed all my friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go get the third quadrant ready for release.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin SALUTES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got any clones of Quill's old music on the ship?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brahl is shaving, when, suddenly, JAY AND THE AMERICAN'S "COME A LITTLE BIT CLOSER" STARTS PLAYING over the interc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO RAVAGERS outside the cell hear the MUSIC.     They tu unlocking the cell door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they enter, THE CAMERA OVERTAKES them, arriving before they do at --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu, sitting calmly; Rocket is finishing ATTACHING THE ASS FIN TO HIS HEAD. Its electrical systems POP on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSH IN ON the two surprised Ravagers trying to UNHOLSTER THEIR PISTOLS in time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu WHISTLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ARROW FLIES OFF a shelf of supplies and SHOOTS TOWARD WALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ARROW PUNCHES THROUGH THE WALL behind the Ravagers. T swirl to see it --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And THEN THE OTHER --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then to Yondu; he CATCHES it, and STANDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He SAUNTERS past the two Ravagers as they WOBBLE and FALL Rocket and Groot follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the way out the door, Rocket looks down and sees TWO PISTOLS beside the dead Ravagers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface is awoken by JAY AND THE AMERICANS on the PA. glances over to see the open drawer beside him, sans gargantuan fin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He SCRAMBLES for the comm, yelling into it --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hoard of Ravagers hear Taserface's voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE'S GOT IT! YONDU'S GOT THE DAMN FIN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALL OF THE RAVAGERS all over the ship, in a panic, LOAD T WEAPONS and HEAD TOWARD THE CELL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu and Rocket and Groot COME AROUND THIS CORNER IN SLO MOTION, the three biggest badasses in the history of cine

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HOARD OF RAVAGERS, led by Brahl, FILE IN at the end of hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Yondu WHISTLES and the ARROW TWISTS QUICKLY BACK AND FORTH, SLICING THROUGH EACH OF THEM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu SLAMS through a door into -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes step onto a catwalk in this, the biggest space the Eclector. There are catwalks throughout and dozens of docked M-ships. The SCURRILOUS RAVAGER sees them from abo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Down there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN AN EXTREME WIDE ANGLE, we see the ARROW FLYING UP AND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAVAGERS, closer and further from CAMERA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We TRAVEL BEHIND YONDU AND ROCKET as BODIES FALL AROUND T IN SLOW-MOTION LIKE FIREWORKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot looks up and sees RETCH looking down at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RETCH FLEES in terror as Groot GROWS branches to pull him up behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot HOWLS FURIOUSLY, TAKING CHASE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Retch YOWLS like a child as he frantically runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Groot GROWS HIS BRANCHES around RETCH's legs, TRIPPIN HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAM! He FALLS, face first to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And, with a WAR CRY, Baby Groot FLINGS the sadistic Ravag off the edge towards the abyss below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As RETCH FALLS past Yondu and Rocket, Baby Groot DROPS ba down onto Rocket's shoulder, and they push their way thro the doorway -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu, Rocket, and Groot move into this area, where they up at DOZENS OF SECURITY MONITORS encircling them showing Ravagers filing toward them from every part of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu WHISTLES as he watches the MONITORS -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON A MONITOR, the arrow FLIES out the wall. He whistles s that it strikes TWO RAVAGERS running towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It ZIPS out of that room and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HOARD of Ravagers come running down a hall. The ARROW Z overhead, smashing out all the lights so that the hall is completely dark, except for the DIM RED LIGHT OF THE ARRO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we can just make out the RED LIGHT smashing through t body of every Ravager there and then on into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A YELLING CROWD OF RAVAGERS come, hungry for war, when th arrow SHOOTS THROUGH THE CHAINS holding a giant spaceship place over their heads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It FALLS, instantly CRUSHING them all, and then zips on -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gef the Ravager is drunkenly drinking a mug of beer, when arrow zips past him and through the mug, SHATTERING it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Gef looks at the shattered mug, confused, the arrow co flying back, ripping through Gef himself, FLINGING him of the bar stool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket also uses the MONITORS to pinpoint where their attackers are. He methodically SHOOTS THROUGH the walls, striking the Ravagers as they get closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE OVERHEAD SHOT, the CAMERA REVOLVES as hoards of Rava GET CLOSE to Yondu and Rocket but the arrow and gunshots THROUGH THE WALLS taking them all down, one by one, like Busby Berkely gone mad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then Yondu stops, seeing something on one of the MONITORS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface, clutching a big ass gun, is marching down the towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu WHISTLES, loudly and angrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface sees THE ARROW COMING AROUND A CORNER TOWARDS H

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu WHISTLES again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ARROW BURSTS INTO FLAMES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface DODGES it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to watch it go, CACKLING pridefully over his agility.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But his smile quickly dissipates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The arrow PLUNGES into a giant tank - which EXPLODES, ENGULFING HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge portion of the giant spacecraft EXPLODES, leading domino effect of one part of the ship BURSTING after anot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROCKET is dumbfounded as he sees on the MONITORS the nume EXPLOSIONS throughout the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You maniac. The whole ship is gonna blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A DOOR SWINGS OPEN and TASERFACE FALLS ONTO THE FLOOR, ENGULFED IN FLAMES, but furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He angrily SLAPS off the flames as he reaches for a COMMUNICATIONS MODULE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the whole ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu catches the arrow and walks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin ENTERS, pulling latches and flipping switches and twisting dials on elementary flight controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With pained effort, Taserface PULLS UP A VIDEO SCREEN wit SOVEREIGN CHAMBERMAID.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this? You're not supposed to be on this line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sending you the coordinates for Yondu's ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu enters with Rocket and Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Release the quadrant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I only ask one thing. That your High Priestess tells him the name of the man what sealed his fate: Taserface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CHAMBERMAID laughs uncontrollably at his name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taserface looks really sad as he EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Rocket and Groot, frightened, feel the SHIP EXPLODING around them, Kraglin pulls up one final latch -

dialogues.speaker: THE ENTIRE REAR UPPER QUADRANT OF THE ECLECTOR DETACHES F
dialogues.text: THE REST OF THE SHIP, while the remains CONTINUE EXPLODIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket and Groot are amazed as the SHIP thrusts forward, from the explosions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin keys into a JUMP POINT ahead. Nearby, Rocket pull the Navigation panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where to, Cap'n?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket SETS THE DESTINATION:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO, BOY!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Quadrant TREMBLES as they hit THE JUMP POINT.    It B out of present space, making the JUMP to -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Quadrant POPS into a blue sky above a DESERT with two fighting KRONANS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inside the ship, Rocket, Yondu, Kraglin, and baby Groot h on for dear life as the ship VIOLENTLY SHAKES and THE LOCATIONS OUTSIDE OF THE WINDOW RAPIDLY SHIFT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their bodies DISTEND SLIGHTLY. Yondu is furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It ain't healthy for a mammalian body to hop over fifty jumps at a time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're about to do seven-hundred.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket looks bummed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Quadrant pops out of a jump point into this Pepto Bis pink land, SMASHING THROUGH an AMOEBA-LIKE BLOB, and then through the next jump point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin, Yondu, Rocket, and Baby Groot all SCREAM, their entire faces and bodies distorting as if in some evil funhouse mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The yellow sun CURVES SLOWLY WEST TO EAST over this magnificent landscape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TILT DOWN to Quill, on this veranda, gazing out at the beauty. The Walkman is connected to small, jerry-rigged speakers nearby, PLAYING SAM COOKE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I guess this could all be mine someday.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora isn't paying attention. She's fooling with a communications device, which has no reception.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket? Rocket, you there?   Dammit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill comes up behind her, messing with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing, Peter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dance with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. I'm not --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. This is Sam Cooke, one of the greatest Earth singers of all time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora lets out an exasperated SIGH, but, reluctantly, st DANCING with him. She is incredibly light on her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill smiles and Gamora, despite herself, does as well. H TWIRLS HER AND BRINGS HER BACK IN. This is definitely not first time they've done this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax thinks you're not a dancer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you ever tell anyone about this, I'll kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When are we going to do something about this... unspoken thing between us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What unspoken thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sort of thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no unspoken thing between us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that's a Catch-22. Because if you said there was, it would be spoken, and then you'd be a liar. So by saying there isn't, you're telling the truth, and admitting there is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora PULLS AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What we should be discussing right now is that something about this place doesn't feel right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? You were the one who wanted me to come here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora moves into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That girl, Mantis. She's afraid of something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill follows her.   He stops, staring at her, hurt and frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you trying to take this from me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's my father. He's blood -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have blood on earth. You never wanted to return there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again - you made me come here! And Earth?! Earth is the place my mother died in front of me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's because that's real, and this is a fantasy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is real. I'm only half human, remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the half I'm worried about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I get it. You're jealous because I'm part god! You like me being the weak one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora adds some pieces to her transmitter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh. You were insufferable to begin with. I haven't been able to reach Rocket. I'm going to see if I can get a signal outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, this isn't Cheers after all. It's whatever the show is where one person is willing to, you know, open themselves up to new possibilities, and the other person is just kind of a jerk who doesn't trust anyone! It's a show that doesn't exist - it would never be made, it would be so horrible! It would get zero ratings!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're having a conversation with yourself! I don't know what Cheers is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I finally found my family, don't you understand that!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought you already had.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So this is how it ends, then? Our whole story. Like this? You and me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get it through your head, Peter. There is no you and me. There never was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill watches her leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora sits, alone in the fields, pouting, fuming.   She stops, staring angrily inward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two plants, nearby, flitter against one another in the wi making a CLICKING sound. She side-eyes them. They don't s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She slices them off with her sword.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dammit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora hears something. She turns to see, in the distance M-ship flying toward the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She watches as it gets closer and closer, and realizes it FLYING DIRECTLY AT HER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora RUNS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula HOLLERS as she BLASTS HER GUNS, DIVING towards Gam

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora FLEES from Nebula's ship like Cary Grant from the duster in North by Northwest as HUGE CHUNKS OF LAND EXPLO on either side of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora leaps into a DITCH, LANDING HARD, as the M-Ship SW just a couple feet above her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You psychopath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora sees the M-Ship banking and FLYING BACK at her aga

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands and runs along the hillside as GUN BLASTS burs behind her. But Gamora sees a CAVERN, leading down into t earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She DARTS into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Gamora RUNS down the cavern, she glances back over her shoulder where Nebula, insane with rage, continues FLYING towards her --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The M-SHIP ENTERS THE CAVERN, which is too small for it, CLIPPING ITS WINGS - but it keeps flying. It again BLASTS Gamora as she FLEES -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BLASTS cause the ground to COLLAPSE around Gamora, an she FALLS, SMASHING DOWN THROUGH ONE LEVEL, to another le below, SLAMMING HARD on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The underside of the M-ship gets SCRAPED APART as it flie above her, and pieces of it come RAINING DOWN around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula ZOOMS towards a huge cavern wall.   She tries to t her ship in time, to no avail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SIDESWIPES it, falling down, CRASHING on the ground, where she is now on the same level as Gamora.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora sees something beside her: it's one of the ENORMOU BLASTERS from the M-ship, attached to an AMMO RIG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula sees Gamora, through the canopy, picking up the blaster, and clutching it. It is comically enormous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula struggles to get free and out of the way, but her have been pinned in the crash -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora CLAMPS two metal switches together, MACHINE-FIRING GUN, as she walks forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front of the M-ship is peppered with blasts and then EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The explosion causes the thin ground around it to COLLAPS and the entire ship FALLS BACKWARDS to an even LOWER LEVE BURSTING some more as it hits the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora gazes down at the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula is a mess. Her legs are broken, trapped in the shi There is a FIRE at her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She struggles, trying to get out, but her machine parts a SPARKING and she can hardly breathe. It seems as she's go to die, when --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Part of the ship is TORN AWAY.    She sees Gamora.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora GRABS HER, unceremoniously PULLING HER FREE, just the M-ship EXPLODES, PITCHING THEM BOTH to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They lie next to each other. Nebula COUGHS as her legs ar healing, CRACKING back into place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks over and eyes Gamora.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then she HOLLERS and attacks her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you kidding me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They FIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula snatches Gamora's blade from her, and TUMBLES on t of her as she gains the upper hand. She holds the blade above Gamora, ready to plummet it into her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wants to - she really does - but now that the moment here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SCREAMS in frustration, and falls back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora eyes her, a little surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I win. I bested you in combat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, no, I just spared your life -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were stupid enough to let me live so -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just let me live!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I WIN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GAMORA                      NEBULA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula, I really don't need      I don't need you always this. My day has been bad        trying to beat me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not the one who just flew across the universe because I wanted to win!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't tell me what I want!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have to because you make it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YOU WERE THE ONE WHO WANTED TO WIN, I JUST WANTED A SISTER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora stops suddenly, struck.   Nebula is cracking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were all I had, but you were the one who needed to win! Thanos pulled my eye from my head and my brain from my skull and my arm from my body because of you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora doesn't know what to say. Nebula is almost instant embarrassed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sit there for a moment, saying nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Quarters are entombed in stars. The dim sound of "BRA comes from within.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill lies in bed, unable to sleep, listening to the song

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You all right, son?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill turns to see Ego in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw your girl stomp off earlier in quite a huff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill sits up, nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego sits beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fortuitous you're listening to this song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know - ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Brandy' by Looking Glass.   A favorite of your mom's.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of earth's greatest musical compositions. Perhaps its very greatest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You and I, Peter, we're the sailor in the song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego speaks along with the lyrics as they play.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He came on a summer's day, bringing gifts from far away - like the child I put in your mother, or the freedom you brought Gamora.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill listens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brandy, you're a fine girl, what a good wife you would be. But my life, my love, my lady is the sea. The sea calls the sailor back. He loves the girl, but that's not his place. The sea calls upon him as history calls upon great men, and sometimes we are deprived the pleasures of mortals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you might not be mortal, but

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Death will remain a stranger to both of us as long as the light burns within the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm immortal? That's... really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, as long as the light exists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I can use the light to make cool things? Like how you made all this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll take thousands of years of practice before you get really good at it . But, yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, get ready for an eight hundred foot statue of Pac Man, then. With Skeletor. And Heather Locklear. I'm gonna make some weird shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego puts his arm around him, smiles kindly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't wait to see your weird shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Came out a little disgusting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They CHUCKLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is a tremendous responsibility, Peter. Only we can remake the universe. Only we can take the bridle of the cosmos and lead it where it needs to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego holds up his fingers, letting forth a flame of white cosmic light. Quill holds up his fingers, letting forth a smaller, less intense flame of white cosmic light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL MANTIS, IN THE HALL, around the corner, looking at and Quill and the light emanating from their fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis looks like she's having a panic attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE-UP OF DRAX, sound asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax! Drax!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He WAKES to see a panicked Mantis sitting on the bed besi him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax, we need to talk -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh. I am sorry, but I like a woman with some meat on her bones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried to let you down easily by telling you I found you disgusting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! That's not what I -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax starts to GAG.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm imagining being with you physically!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax, that's not - I don't like you like that. I don't even like the type of thing you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! There's no need to get personal!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen! Ego's gotten exactly what he wanted. I should have told you earlier, I am stupid. You are in danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora and Nebula still sit here, quietly and awkwardly. Gamora glances down a twisting tunnel, where phosphoresce lights shine brightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves towards it.   Nebula, hesitantly, follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego and Quill enter the palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to readjust the way you process life. Everything around us - including the girl - is temporary. We are forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't eternity get boring?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not if you have a purpose, Peter. Which is why you're here. I told you how all those years ago I had an unceasing impulse to find life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego is standing underneath the diorama of him facing the little alien girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't tell you how when I did find it, it was all so... disappointing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora and Nebula move further down the cavern, stepping light, getting closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that is when I came to a profound realization.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My innate desire to seek out other life was not so that I could walk among that life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego looks at his son, moved by the memories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter, I had found meaning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill is taken aback. But Ego sets his finger lightly on forehead, and the white light bursts through his son's bo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see THE COSMOS IN QUILL'S EYES. He looks ecstatic, far beyond where he stands, and seems to finally understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see it. Eternity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora and Nebula stop, in horror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are staring at piles and piles of skeletons of vario species, thousands of them, seeming to go on forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to get off this planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see traces of the UNIVERSAL NEURAL TELEPORTATION NETWO the Quadrant a blinking light POPPING IN and OUT on a tra across the cosmos -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then ZOOM BACK FURTHER TO THE UNIVERSE, the same blin light making its way while ROCKET, YONDU, and KRAGLIN SCR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WATCHERS swirl to the Quadrant SWISH past them and JUMPS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn back to STAN LEE, in a spacesuit with a fishbow helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, before I was so rudely interrupted, that time I was a World War II vet -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE QUADRANT POPS INTO SPACE, EGO'S PLANET nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu, Kraglin, Rocket and Groot FALL OUT OF THEIR SEATS, RETCHING, clutching their stomachs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell you doing, boy?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could tell by how you talked about him - this Ego is bad news. We're here to save Quill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For `honor'? For `love'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! I don't care about those things! I want to save Quill so I can prove I'm better than him! I can lord this over him forever!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu LAUGHS bitterly as he pulls himself up to the contr Rocket yanks himself up beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you laughing at me for?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can fool yourself and everyone else but you can't fool me. I know who you are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know anything about me, loser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know everything about you. I know you play like the meanest and the hardest `cause you actually the most scared of all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you steal batteries you don't need and you push away anyone who's willing to put up with you, `cause just a little bit of love reminds you how big and empty that hole inside you actually is!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, shut up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know the scientists what made you never gave a rat's ass about you -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm serious, dude - !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just   like my own damn parents, who sold   me, their own little baby, into   slavery! I know who you are, boy,   because you're me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stare at each other there, a mirror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kind of pair are we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kind that's about to go fight a planet I reckon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, okay, that's - Wait. Fight a what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora, furious, BURSTS into the room.   She sees Mantis standing with Drax.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She RUNS to her, GRABBING HER by the neck --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And she SLAMS her against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you people?! What is this place?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is she doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just watching the fireworks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora, let her go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bodies in the caverns, who are they?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora, whose skin is touching Mantis, lets go of her nec terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DIORAMAS all around Quill and Ego TRANSFORM into a ma the universe. Quill stares in his cosmic reverie at the PLANETS around him - thousands of them with pieces of EGO LIFEFORM - GLOWING COSMIC PLANTS - buried within them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I call it the Expansion. It is my purpose. And now it's yours as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill stares up at a DIORAMA: Ego grabs handfuls of his o body, engulfed in light, and plants the wriggling pieces various planets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over thousands of years I implanted thousands of extensions of myself on thousands of worlds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the DIORAMAS, the COSMIC PLANTS OVERGROW and COVER eac the planets, like chocolate on a malt ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I needed to fulfill life's one true purpose: to grow and to spread, covering all that exists, until everything... is me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora backs away, recovering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did she do to me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She already told me everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I only had one problem. A single Celestial doesn't have enough power for such an enterprise. But two Celestials - well now, that just might do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bodies are his children.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora is horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the DIORAMAS we see Ego with hundreds of species of fe aliens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of all my labors the most beguiling was attempting to graft my DNA with that of another species. I hoped the result of such a coupling would be enough to power the expansion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu and Rocket walk here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had Yondu deliver some of them to me. It broke the Ravager code - but I compensated him generously. And, to ease his conscience, I told him I would never hurt them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was true. They never felt a thing. But, one after the other, they failed me. None of them had the Celestial genes. Until you, Peter. Out of all my spawn, only you have carried the connection to the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter smiles, an enchanted idiot, the cosmos in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to find Peter now and get off this damn planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego will have won him to his side by now. He has a way of -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we just go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. He's our friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All any of you do is yell at each other. You're not friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. We're family. We leave no one behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Except maybe you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the first time in my life, I am truly not alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill suddenly looks sad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it, son?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the mortal in you, Peter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. I don't need that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are they?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Temporary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you love them. But love is merely an evolutionary trick in the service of reproduction. We are beyond such things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But my mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego looks at him, questioningly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said you loved my mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That I did. My river lily, who knew the words to every song that came on the radio. I returned to earth to see her three times. I knew if I came back a fourth, I'd never leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The expansion, the reason for my very existence would be over. So I did what I had to do. But it broke my heart to put that tumor in her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wh- what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ZOLLY IN ON QUILL as the cosmos disappear from his eyes. Tears stream down his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know that sounds bad -

dialogues.speaker: QUILL PULLS OUT HIS PISTOLS AND FIRES
dialogues.text: THROUGH EGO, DISPERSING the MOLECULES forming his body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill SHOOTS at him AGAIN and AGAIN and AGAIN. The flesh disappears from Ego like bites from a cookie, exposing th angry alien skeletal form beneath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, as the charge on Peter's blasters wears out, Ego jus looks at him, and, although he's filled with holes, he's merely disappointed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who in the hell do you think you are?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You killed my mother!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGO TRANSFORMS into DAVID HASSELHOFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried so hard to find the form that best suited you, and this is the thanks I get?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then, once again, BECOMES HIS USUAL FORM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really need to grow up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SPIKY COSMIC LIGHT-PROPELLED TENDRIL SHOOTS UP from the floor behind Quill, and JUTS into Quill's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill is THRUST INTO THE AIR.   He opens his mouth to SCR and WHITE LIGHT EMITS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanted to do this together! But I suppose you'll have to learn by spending the next thousand years as a battery, `Star-Lord'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THROUGH THE WINDOW to the PALACE - PAN TO Gamora watching her TRANSMITTER - the one she was trying to contact Rocke - BEEPS. She answers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora follows Drax, Nebula, and a confused Mantis as the move out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, Yondu, and Groot are CRAWLING into a huge LASER DRILL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep that transmitter nearby so I can find you. We're in an old piece of construction equipment Yondu once used to slice open the Bank of A'askavaria.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego's unhinged -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know. Get ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop it, Kraglin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin YANKS a lever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ugly, bulbous and uneven craft PLOPS from the Quadrant and heads toward Ego's surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got a plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's pretty simple.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego walks calmly up beside the trapped Quill. He snatches Walkman off of him. He stares at it. Quill can barely spe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGO PRESSES PLAY. A distorted version of "Brandy" plays. stares at it - perhaps he's feeling wistful sadness, or perhaps nothing at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Brandy, you're a fine girl. What a good wife you would b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `My life, my love, my lady is the sea'? Peter, THIS IS THE SEA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGO CRUSHES THE WALKMAN IN HIS GRIP as Quill watches helplessly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The POWER SURGES from Quill through the TENTACLE and throughout the entire PALACE --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Gamora, Mantis, Drax, and Nebula run toward the Palace BURSTS WITH COSMIC LIGHT, so brightly they have to protec their eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGO basks in the power and we TRAVEL down his legs --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We FOLLOW THE ENERGY THROUGH THE SURFACE OF THE PLANET --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And INTO an ENORMOUS, METAL ORB, the SELF CHAMBER, which EXPLODES WITH LIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PUSH INTO the small plant - now a bit larger - that Eg planted at the very beginning of the film.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It LIGHTS UP and GROWS, INSTANTLY BURSTING UPWARDS -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The PLANT BURSTS UP BEHIND the Dairy Queen (now a modern a huge ORGANIC, BLOB-LIKE MASS OF LIGHT that comes down instantly on the building, CRUSHING it and everyone insid

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGO SUMMONS all his energy, when, SUDDENLY, a DOOR beside SMASHES APART.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax has kicked through it and Gamora, Nebula and Mantis with him. Ego turns to see them, then hears a RUMBLING ab him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to look at a window on the palace wall behind hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey there, Jackass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego looks surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LASER DRILL lands on Ego, SQUASHING HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tendril retracts from Quill as he falls and heaves fo breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cosmic plant, barreling down the street, suddenly STO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax, Gamora, Nebula, and Mantis rush into the crumbling palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door on the side of the Laser Drill SLIDES OPEN. Baby Groot is standing there, smiling, and waving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the way, dumber, smaller Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Drax crawls in, Groot starts PUNCHING Drax as hard as can. Probably because he called him dumb, but who's to sa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora helps up Quill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you something didn't feel right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `I told you so.' That's really what I need right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I came back, didn't I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because there's an unspoken thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no unspoken thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax, Mantis, Gamora, and Quill step inside the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? You could have killed us all crashing in here like that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, `Thank you, Rocket'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We had it under control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We did not. That is only an extension of his true self. He will be back soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's Smurfette doing here!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back rubs, dishes, killing gods, whatever I need to do to get a damn ride home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tried to murder me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saved you, you stupid fox.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not a fox.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not a raboon either!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Raccoon,' whatever!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax looks out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TENTACLE-LIKE STRANDS BURST UP through the palace floorin all around the drill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax turns to the others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do we kill a Celestial?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's the center to him - his brain, his soul, whatever it is, in some sort of shell --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's in the caverns below the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill climbs up the ladder to see -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YONDU?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula looks at Gamora.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he's got that fin back, I am so screwed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu THRUSTS the ship upward for takeoff.   But TENTACLE wrap around the ship --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And YANK IT BACK DOWN into the floor, destroying the foundation of the palce.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone FALLS forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thrusters are out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill starts rewiring the mechanics.
