dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess I should be glad I was a skinny kid. Otherwise you would have delivered me to this maniac!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You still reckon that's the reason I kept you around, you idiot?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what you told me, you old doofus!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once I figured out what happened to them other kids, I wasn't gonna just hand you over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said you were gonna eat me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was being funny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not to me!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You people have issues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill sees THROUGH THE WINDSHIELD where EGO'S CREEPY SKEL is GROWING IN FRONT OF THEM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I have issues that's my fricking father!!... Thrusters are back up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill thrusts the ship FORWARD instead of up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It CRASHES through Ego and DOWN THE SLOPING FLOOR --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And OUT THROUGH the giant pane of glass at the end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone holds on in what's essentially the worst roller coaster drop ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should be going up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't. Ego wants to eradicate the universe as we know it. We have to kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They PLUMMET toward a fissure in the earth below.   It's small for the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket BLASTS the lasers perfectly, CHIPPING AWAY PIECES rock, forming an opening in the crack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They SMASH into the opening, barely fitting, leading down into the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill flies perfectly, TWISTING through tunnels and aroun corners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket mans the lasers, BLASTING PIECES OUT OF PLACE just time so they can SCRAPE through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, we're saving the galaxy again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awesome. We'll really be able to jack up our prices if we're two- time-galaxy savers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I seriously can't believe that is where your mind goes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was just a random thought, man! I thought we were friends!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I care about the planets, and the buildings, and all of the animals on the planets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis GIGGLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crabby puppy is so cute he makes me want to die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your suicidal thoughts sadden me, but your wish will likely come true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MEANWHILE, Kraglin is mellowly hanging out, eating some s and listening to "WHAM BAM" BY SILVER as he sees somethin out in the distance of space. He looks a bit closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AYESHA is remotely piloting one of the ships.   She looks determined and angry on the vid-screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And, one by one, Sovereign OMNICRAFT POP IN all around he until there is a large fleet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ayesha, in full pilot gear, yells into her comm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pilots, release envoy units!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smaller, more nimble robotic ENVOYS, like big pods with blasters for arms - detach from the front of every Omnicr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our sensors detect the batteries are below the surface of the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OVERHEAD SHOT: On the screens in all the pods, the envoys DIVE toward the planet from slightly different directions

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin, in shock, watches the massive fleet of envoys di downward. He grabs the comm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhh... Cap'n?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cap'n?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu doesn't hear the CRACKLING SPEAKER beside him as th maneuver down through the fissure. Quill eyes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So why'd Ego want you here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He needs my genetic connection to the light to help destroy the universe. He tried to teach me how to control the power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So could you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little. I made a ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A ball?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought as hard as a could, that's all I could come up with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You `thought'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think when I make this arrow fly I use my head?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you use?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at each other instead of where they're going, a the CRASH into an overhanging piece of rock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire side door is RIPPED OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the SCREECH through a smaller space and into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Laser Drill DROPS into this enormous open space withi the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians gather on the side of the ship open to the hollow, gazing out at its stunning beauty, lit by Ego's w glow running throughout it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis turns, looking through the portholes on the other side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There! Thats Ego's core.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis points at the Self Chamber, down below them.   The twist down towards it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That ore's thick. Rocket, we're gonna need to use the big laser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket nods, FLICKS switches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the small lasers on the sides move through grooves to combine into one huge laser in the center of the ship: th MEGA-LASER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We must hurry. It will not take Ego long to find us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it still!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill steadies the craft as best he can beside the Self Chamber. But it's an unwieldy beast, built for power, not precision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket powers up the mega-laser and holds tight to the SHUDDERING CONTROLS as it DRILLS, BURNING a HOLE into the protective sheathe. It melts and drips down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We drill into the center, we kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill holds tight to the steering wheel. Yondu notices th BLINKING LIGHT on the comm. He taps it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it, Kraglin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um, remember that Ayesha chick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu looks out the window where AYESHA'S SQUADRON is SWOOPING OUT OF the cracks in the ceiling all around them

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill PULLS AWAY from the envoys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the Sovereign envoys start BLASTING AT THE CRAFT all once; the LASER LOSES POWER and the VEHICLE TURNS SIDEWAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax, Mantis, and Gamora GO TUMBLING from the hole in the side. Nebula and Groot grab onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora, Drax, and Mantis FALL from an incredible height. LAND - ONE, TWO, THREE - WITH APLOMB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora looks up and sees the Laser Drill CURL behind the Chamber as it tries to avoid the envoys' BLASTERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula and Groot settle as the ship rights itself and BLA PIERCE the ship around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill peers down at Rocket, who has jumped out of his sea and is pouring out the contents of his satchel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why aren't you firing the laser?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They blew out the generator! I think I packed a small detonator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A detonator is worthless without explosives!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We got these!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket shows Nebula the Anulax batteries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill leaves the controls to Yondu as he CLIMBS down besi Rocket, now messing with wiring on his BOMB.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it strong enough to kill Ego?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it is, it will cause a chain reaction throughout his entire nervous system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meaning what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire planet will explode. We'll have to get out of here fast. I rigged a timer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket stuffs the bomb back in his satchel.   Groot climb his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket and Quill slap on their AERO RIGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The run and jump out of the laser drill, FLYING ON THEIR RIGS, avoiding the GUNFIRE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ZOOM towards the blast hole on the side of the self chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket and Quill land here, messily, TUMBLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis is worried about something else entirely; the enti chasm begins TREMBLING and the walls start to MUTATE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't you say you could make him sleep?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he wants! He's too powerful! I can't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have to believe in yourself because I believe in you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look ahead. They see, on the enormous wall in front them, the LIGHT-FORM of a giant EGO SCREAMING ANGRILY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His SCREAM becomes a TUNNEL OF ROCKS RUSHING TOWARDS THEM like a train.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis sees a nerve bundle on the ground coming from Ego' Core. Although afraid, she grabs it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLEEP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SCREAMS with effort and some pain as energy travels through the bundle and into the core, where it darkens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LIGHT LEAVES THE ROCK FORMATION and it SLAMS into the ground in front of them, SPLASHING DIRT OVER THEM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they are safe, shivering. Drax and Gamora look at eac other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never thought she'd be able to do it. With as skinny and weak as she appears to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis's arm is TREMBLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know how long I can hold him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to, girl. If you don't keep Ego at bay, we all die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket shines a powerful PEN-LIGHT inside the cavity, exposing the interior, spattered with Swiss-cheese-like h glowing with light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The metal is too thick! For the bomb to work we'd actually need to place it on Ego's core. And our fat butts ain't gonna fit through those tiny holes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill slowly eyes Groot, who is playing with a leaf on hi arm and thinking about something else entirely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a terrible idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is the only kind of idea we got left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket SIGHS. He puts Groot on his back and MOVES with Gr deeper into the blast hole, mumbling to himself:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unbelievable. `Rocket, do this. Rocket, do that.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill turns toward the opening. PUSH UP AND IN ON QUILL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, what a day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He jumps out into the fray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill FLIES UP as a ship FLIES in toward him BLASTING, an he's about to fire back. MAN VS. SPACESHIP. This is most likely the beginning of the biggest, baddest fight scene ever, but instead we CUT TO -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quiet. Blasts in the deep background. Rocket places a tin bomb in front of Groot. It is a small, simple device with two switches and two buttons. He explains, very carefully

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right. First you flick this switch, then this switch. That activates it. And then you push this button, which will give you five minutes to get out of there. Whatever you do don't push this button, because that will set off the bomb immediately, and we'll all be dead. Now repeat back what I just said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh huh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! That's the button that will kill everyone! Try again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot thinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! That's exactly what you just said! How is that even possible?! Which button is the button you're supposed to push?! Point to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot thinks. And he points to the one that will kill everyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, you're making him nervous!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket runs to see, at the end of the hole, a sliver of t outside as Quill peeks in while SHOOTING at envoys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up! And give me some tape! Does anyone have any tape out there!? I want to put some tape over the death button!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have any tape.    Let me check.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill disappears from the hole.    As Rocket waits, he he amongst the chaos, faintly -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yo, Yondu, do you have any - ow! - do you have any tape?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear VOICES GRUMBLING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket and Groot look around, waiting. Rocket is impatien He coughs. Groot is like a bored kid in a waiting room. H shifts around and plays with the wires on the bomb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill reappears outside the hole, SHOOTING an envoy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one has any tape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a single person has tape?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have priceless batteries and an atomic bomb in your bag! If anyone had tape it would be you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's exactly my point! I have to do everything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, you're wasting time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket turns back to Groot, who has already taken the bom and is heading towards the hole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He makes a "WHEEEEEE" sound and smiles brightly as he HOP into the hole and SLIDES down as if on a water slide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, heavy-lidded, watches him go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all gonna die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu and Nebula, in the cockpit, are being overcome as blasts come through the walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're done for without the generator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula MOANS, frustrated. She flips open a section of the dashboard, then a part of her arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The remaining Sovereign envoys have ENCIRCLED the battere Laser Drill, BLASTING IT TO BITS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill FLIES into the Laser Drill, SLAMMING into the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians! Perhaps it will provide you solace that your deaths are not without purpose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula is feeding the wires from the craft into her mechanical arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The actual Ayesha, fitted with the pilot gear, looks at t Laser Drill on the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They will serve as a warning to all of those tempted with betraying us; don't screw with the Sovereign.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu works some switches: The LASERS slide back into the slots all over the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is gonna hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Promises, promises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu flips ALL the switches; ALL THE POWER RUNS PAINFULL

dialogues.speaker: AND THE LASERS BEAM OUT OF THE SHIP IN ALL DIRECTIONS AT
dialogues.text: ONCE, like a dangerous disco ball, slicing through almost nearly every single ENVOY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BEAM ALMOST HITS Drax, but he LEAPS out of the way. Smo rises from a hole in the ground between him and Mantis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With flair, Yondu spins the pilot's wheel, so that the wh rig REVOLVES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ayesha looks on, in horror as the BEAMS SLICE THROUGH the remaining CRAFT - and one is COMING HER WAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ayesha SITS BACK. She looks around her at the other pods: of them are down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO! NOOOOO!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill sees FLAMING CHUNKS FLY into the rig...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And FIRE SPILLING toward the ship's engine, dripping fuel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna blow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu WHISTLES as the FLAMES HIT THE FUEL -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora watches as the ENTIRE LASER DRILL EXPLODES.   She stricken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees a tiny body flying from the ship - it's Nebula, LANDS across from her on her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora looks at her, worried. Nebula gives her what might a little smile, and looks upward. Gamora follows her line sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill is FLYING FROM THE EXPLOSION on his aero-rig. Yondu holding onto a flying arrow: his one arm up straight, his heels touching. Quill looks at him and SNICKERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look like Mary Poppins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he cool?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill looks at the man who raised him. He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. He's cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu looks out at the Guardians as he comes in for a landing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Mary Poppins, y'all!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill and Yondu LAND beside Nebula. Gamora sees Quill and MARCHES TOWARD HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CAMERA CIRCLES GAMORA AND QUILL, FIERY SHIP FRAGMENTS RAINING DOWN AROUND THEM IN SLOW-MOTION, as if this is th greatest heavy metal video of all time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other Guardians enter, one by one - Nebula, Drax, Yon Rocket FLYING DOWN on his aero-rig, and finally, Mantis, staring forward with concentration until --

dialogues.speaker: A HUGE CHUNK OF SPACESHIP FLIES IN FROM THE SIDE, FLATTEN
dialogues.text: MANTIS. The others all look down at her in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Wow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis, UNCONSCIOUS BENEATH a ship fragment, has lost hol Ego.

dialogues.speaker: THE ENTIRE HOLLOW AROUND THEM BEGINS TO RUMBLE. THE GRO
dialogues.text: AND WALLS THEMSELVES SHIFT and WAVER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole cavity is alive. Drax checks on Mantis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's just unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot RUNS and HOPS through the tunnels. He comes to a crossroads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees a COSMIC LIGHT emanating from one tunnel.   He da off toward it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long before the bomb goes off?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the unlikely event Groot doesn't kill us all, about six minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu speaks into the comm on his lapel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin, NODDING OUT, abruptly wakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need the Quadrant for extraction in T-minus five minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aye, Cap'n!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our heroes peer up to see the SURFACE OF THE PLANET UNFOL ABOVE THEM, so that THE BRIGHT SKY SHINES THROUGH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone needs to be up top when Kraglin arrives. Drax, take Mantis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax nods. He picks up Mantis. Quill grabs the aero-rig o himself and SLAPS it on Drax's back, which AUTOMATICALLY WRAPS around his upper body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhh! My nipples!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He FLIES UPWARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ground around them SPLITS INTO ENORMOUS CRACKS. Gamor sees a CRACK IN THE EARTH RUSHING TOWARD her and Quill, a she turns toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Gamora's side CRUMBLES AWAY, GAMORA FALLING DOWN with

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HUGE BURSTS OF EARTH SHOOT UP all around Drax, Yondu, Roc and Quill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The planet has formed GIANT TENTACLES THAT HURTLE towards heroes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora is PLUMMETING, seemingly to her death, when she lo over and sees Nebula FALLING just behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula grabs Gamora's arm and then grabs onto a passing cliff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They SNAP TO A STOP- OW! - hanging down off the side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula tosses Gamora up onto a flat surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Nebula climbs up after her, Gamora looks at her, wary surprised by this beneficence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, get over it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill BLASTS a tentacle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu WHISTLES, the ARROW WEAVING THROUGH TENTACLES aroun them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket TOSSES a bunch of tiny bombs at some, which they s to and EXPLODE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they are by no means winning this fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The giant Quadrant LOWERS toward the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora looks at Nebula.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to get up to the extraction point!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look over the edge and see a huge RIFT OF LAND RISIN QUICKLY. They look at each other and JUMP -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They GRAB ONTO THE EDGE of the rising rift, CLUTCHING TO as it FLIES upward toward the open space above them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax FLIES UP onto the surface; he sees the Quadrant wait for him there. He DARTS for the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin opens the LOADING DOOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But huge swatches of the planet reach up and GRAB onto th Quadrant, YANKING IT DOWN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin, freaking out, throws the thrusters into high gea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thrusters FLARE as the massive ship STRUGGLES to free itself from Ego's tendrils.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And it does PULL ITSELF UP for a moment, but the tendrils tighten, SLAMMING it back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The whole Quadrant starts to TIP OVER. Kraglin falls down against the side of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax sees the ship FALLING TOWARDS HIM and he RUNS away f it in fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he arrives a the edge of a cliff. He crouches as the ship CONTINUES DOWN toward him, about to SQUASH both he a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Kraglin heroically CRAWLS his way back up to the cont as he dangles from them. He pushes on the thrusters, so t the ship goes back upright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax turns and again RUNS toward the Quadrant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora and Nebula are still rising on the rift when they into a wall near the opening in the surface of the planet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill turns and sees Ego, in his terrifying SKELETAL LIGH FORM, STROLLING DOWN TOWARDS HIM as the land around him P LIKE THE RED SEA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Ego walks, THE DIRT AND MOLECULES AROUND EGO FORM ORGA IN HIS BODY, piecing himself back together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill sees a tentacle SLAM Yondu to the ground and COVER ENTIRE BODY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to see Rocket HOLLERING as he FIRES at tentacles but they OVERWHELM him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The earth WRAPS AROUND Drax's legs like quicksand, pullin him and Mantis down into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora and Nebula scramble, trying to CLIMB BACK UP, when TENDRILS WRAP AROUND THEM, stopping them from going furth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls are tightening around Groot. He grows his branc to try to stop them, but they aren't working.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He begins to CRY, like an actual baby, terrified, on the brink of suffocating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego approaches his son. He is fully formed, and he is mor truly "himself." Alien. Dark eyes and pale skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you I don't want to do this alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You cannot deny the purpose the universe has bestowed upon you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And once again, the LIGHT TENDRILS STAB THROUGH QUILL'S B thrusting him to his knees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smaller light tendrils stab into his face and body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we see the LIGHT being sucked out of Quill and up int the Self Chamber once more as it BURSTS WITH LIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POLICE OFFICERS and bystanders are in the streets, snappi phone photos, etc, beside the HUGE, STILL SWATCH OF EGO'S LIFEFORM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, everyone. Step back. I need you all to clear the -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The LIFEFORM ALIGHTS WITH ENERGY and MOVES again, SPILLIN INCREDIBLY QUICKLY towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People abandon their cars in traffic as it RUNS OVER THEM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WOMAN FALLS. People TRAMPLE around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But an old man's hands reach in, helping her up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL GRANDPA QUILL, in his 70's or 80's now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, ma'am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He HELPS the woman into an SUV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He SLAMS on the gas, SCREECHING AWAY from the enormous ti wave of organic light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EGO'S LIFEFORM smashes down the PARK WALLS and into the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (O.S) It doesn't need to be like this

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego approaches his son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you destroying our chance?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AAKONS run from a giant wave behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (O.S) Stop pretending you aren't, what you are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KREE MONKS run from the cosmic flesh as it pours down the hillside behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's too fast, RUSHING OVER THEM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOUSANDS OF ORLONI are darting in fear across this dusty desert, as it WASHES OVER them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (O.S) One in billions..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREE HURCTARIANS run, SCREAMING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (O.S) Trillions, even more!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN EASIK MOTHER clutches her BABY, covering it with her o body, as the spreading lifeform LOOMS UP behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She closes her eyes and waits for the worst.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill looks up at Ego, barely able to focus, as the molec form skin over the muscle and skeleton and innards beneat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What greater meaning could life possibly have to offer?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu struggles beneath the tentacle beside Quill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't use my head to fly the arrow, boy! I use my h -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill hears this as the earth COVERS Yondu's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill LOOKS INWARD. And suddenly, everything becomes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tears come to Peter Quill's eyes as he remember those aro him and what they mean to him. And we see his MEMORIES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill looks back up at Ego as we HEAR the gentle chords o FLEETWOOD MAC'S "THE CHAIN" starts echoing throughout the hollow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He clutches his fist and we see the light growing within

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bits of earth begin to ROLL UP AND SCRAMBLE AND SWIRL aro Quill's body, his arms, his legs, as if he's pulling them towards himself with magnets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Ego looks confused, as the GROUND QUAKES AROUND HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill glares at his father, his voice distorting with Celestial thunder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shouldn't have killed my mom and squished my walkman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahd a SOLID TORNADO OF EARTH PROPELS QUILL FORWARD. Ego tries to protect himself as Quill SLAMS into him, FLYING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill raises his fist, NOW A GIANT CLUB.   And he SMASHES

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Ego loses his concentration --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pair of arms are protruding from the surface of the pla still holding Mantis aloft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The earth falls away, and Drax, who was entirely covered, heaves for breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TENDRILS FALL, freeing Gamora and Nebula as they GASP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu BREAKS THROUGH THE ROCKS around him, drawing in bre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TENTACLES HOLDING ROCKET ALOFT CRUMBLE, and he looks around, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WAVE PUSHES UP against the back of Grandpa Quill's CA and suddenly STOPS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: the mountainous plant, a hundred stories high, is up agai the back of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Easik Mother clutching her baby looks behind her; the wave has stopped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She clutches her baby to her chest, relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tunnel around Groot SNAPS BACK to what it was. Once m he can see the light at the tunnel's end, and one looks l a GIANT BRAIN composed of prismatic light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He RUNS forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket flies up and yells at Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot! Groot, if you can can hear me, hurry up - I'm not sure how long Quill can keep him distracted!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot ARRIVES at the end of the tunnel, and stops there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The center of the core holds a huge cosmic placenta, and, within that, EGO'S TRUE SELF, the COSMIC BRAIN. It ROILS FURIOUSLY, the reflection of its fight with Quill, thrash around within this womb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Although afraid, Groot places the bomb on the placenta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot stares at both buttons, scared - he doesn't know wh one to pick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot makes a decision on which button to press. He goes push the death button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then his finger STOPS just millimeters from the button, TREMBLING. He thinks...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then changes the course of his finger, PUSHING THE CORRECT BUTTON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Groot turns, terrified, and RUNS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax moves with Mantis into the loading bay.    He throws down and climbs up a ladder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE CAMERA SWINGS TO GAMORA AND NEBULA, climbing up to th surface in the dirt storm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego RISES on his own MOLECULAR TORNADO and STRIKES BACK a Quill. He YELLS as he SLAMS Quill against the wall, DRAGG his face along the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He TOSSES Quill into a another wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: QUILL brings his ARM FILLED WITH LIGHT away from the wall that he causes a WAVE OF LIGHT AND ROCK around the interi of the hollow, FLYING TO EGO and knocking him aside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu protects his face as DIRT SWIRLS in the wake of the Quill/Ego battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, carrying Groot, FLIES BACK DOWN beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu! We're about to blow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get to the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not without Quill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gotta take care of the twig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not without you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I ain't done nothing right my whole damn life, rat. You need to give me this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, hesitantly, nods.    He grabs some things from hi He hands them to Yondu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A space suit and an aero rig. I only have one of each.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu nods. Rocket nods too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket starts to go, but STOPS and looks at Yondu.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wants to say something, but he doesn't know what. Baby Groot does.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He says welcome to the frickin' Guardians of the Galaxy... only he didn't use `frickin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bye, twig.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot waves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Rocket FLIES UP toward the surface. Rocket mutters to Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna need to have a discussion about your language.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego SLAMS Quill back against a wall. Ego pulls the huge r away from the wall, FLYING THEM TOWARDS HIM and BATTERING THERE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego and Quill FLY TOWARDS each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego uses the LIGHT TO BRING ROCKS TO HIS BODY, forming a giant AVATAR OF HIMSELF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill brings YELLOW ROCKS to his body, forming a GIANT PA MAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego's form flies into Pac-Man's mouth, so hard there's a SONIC BOOM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fall, TUMBLING, still striking one another on the wa down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They LAND HARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The timer counts down.    A minute left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora and Nebula are caring for Mantis as Rocket and Gro ARRIVE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Peter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket doesn't answer. Or he can't answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, where is he?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket looks down at a timer in his hand. The time is alm there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket?! Rocket, look at me! Where is he?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket just shakes his head a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Groot points sadly outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not leaving without him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora hardens. She stands and SNATCHES A RIFLE off the w She COCKS IT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She STARTS OUT the bay door --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When AN ELECTRICAL BLAST HITS HER from behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She FALLS OVER, unconscious, REVEALING Rocket with his gu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. I can only afford to lose one friend today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin, GO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax looks uncertain as Kraglin presses thrust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. Is Quill back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, where's Quill?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket looks sadly out the bay door as it CLOSES; Drax's voice echoes on his comm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 251             Where's Quill?! WHERE'S QUILL?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill and Ego are exhausted, on their knees and leaning against one another like boxers after too many rounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The timer reads 00:26 seconds

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego reaches for the core..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, we need to stop it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill throws him to the ground. But Ego comes back up, grasping his son's jacket, pleading with him now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me! You are a god! If you kill me, you'll just be like everyone else!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's so wrong with that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ego looks at his son, scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The countdown reaches zero.    The brain EXPLODES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The explosion causes the life forces to BURST THROUGH THE ENTIRE PLANET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything around Quill is EXPLODING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks down at his hands, where the glow FADES and DISAPPEARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gazes up at the mammoth walls around him as they BLOW and COLLAPSE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lowers at head, at peace with the death that's coming, when, from the side, through the debris --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu GRABS him, almost a tackle, really, LIFTING HIM up FLYING AWAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Yondu and Quill FLY UPWARD, the planet EXPLODES behind them, flames licking their heels, huge stretches of the planet caving in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu holds a surprised Quill as they SOAR up into the sk

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He may have been your father, boy. But he wasn't your daddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry I didn't do it right. I'm damn lucky you're my boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill is touched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu SLAPS the SPACESUIT disk onto Quill; THE SHIMMERY SHEATHE COVERS HIM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu breathes out as completely as he can, emptying his lungs. And they EXIT THE PLANET'S ATMOSPHERE, bursting in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill struggles to get free, but Yondu holds him there, trapping him, but it is also an embrace. The ENTIRE PLANE COLLAPSING BEHIND THEM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu, you can't! What are you doing? What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu's jet pack expires its supply of fuel, and they STO THERE, in space, FLOATING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu's grip weakens. Quill turns to face him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu. Yondu, no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu grabs his son's face with both hands, looking and touching him with love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Yondu's FACE EXPANDS and his BODY GOES LIMP as he DIE there. And he starts to DRIFT AWAY. Quill grabs onto his shirt. He is CRYING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And, suddenly, behind Quill, Rocket and Drax PROPEL themselves toward him in aero-rigs, GRABBING him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu's body lies on a plank here: Various colored cloths laid in strips over his body and face, yaro lilies beneat him, red-fired pyres and Yondu's toys all around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, Groot, Drax, Gamora, Mantis, and Kraglin surround table. Quill is at the head. He has to say a few words. B it is not easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other day I told Gamora how I used to pretend my dad was David Hasselhoff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket and Drax exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a singer and actor from earth... a really famous guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And, you know, today it struck me. Yondu didn't have a talking car, but he did have a flying arrow. And he didn't have the voice of an angel, but he did have the whistle of one. And both David Hasselhoff and Yondu went on kickass adventures, and hooked up with hot women, and fought robots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, the thing is, David Hasselhoff kinda did end up being my Dad after all, only he was Yondu. I had a pretty cool Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill starts to break down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what I'm trying to say here is, that thing you're searching for your whole life, sometimes it's right there by your side all along and you don't even know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora sees Nebula, watching from a darkened doorway, bef she turns and walks away. She moves after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot looks up at an upset Rocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. That's the friend I was talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He did call you `twig.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora catches up to Nebula in the hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula turns toward her, but she doesn't look her in the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was just a child. Like you. I was concerned with staying alive until the next day - every day. And I never considered what Thanos was doing to you. I am sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying to make it right, everything I did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are little girls like you were - little boys - all over the universe - who are in danger. You can stay with us, and help them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll help them by killing Thanos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know if that's possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula shrugs: maybe. She turns to leave. But Gamora grab her, perhaps too roughly. Nebula turns, ready to snap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Gamora EMBRACES her. Nebula does not know how to reac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll always be my sister.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tears well in Nebula's eyes and, for just a moment, she embraces her sister back with one hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before pushing her away and leaving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians lift Yondu on the plank. A bulbous and rust crematory is at the center of the room. It doesn't burn w fire, but a SWIRLING, VIBRANT COSMIC ENERGY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They SLIDE YONDU IN as they watch with sadness and respec his body is enveloped by the sparkling colors. Quill clos the door on the crematory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Quill moves away, Kraglin approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill turns toward him. He's holding something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cap'n found this for you in a junker shop. Said someday you'd come back to the fold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin puts an MP3 player in his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's called a Zune - what everyone listens to on earth nowadays. It's got three hundred songs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill nods, touched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill holds out Yondu's arrow.   Kraglin's lip trembles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket grabbed the pieces and reassembled them. I think Yondu would want you to have it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you... Cap'n.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu's SPARKLING ASHES ARE BLOWN OUT IN SPURTS FROM THE CREMATORY INTO SPACE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket, Drax, and Mantis are here, watching Yondu's ashes the vacuum of space, SWIRLING almost magically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill sits down on the bed in Yondu's quarters.   He scro through selections on the Zune.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He comes to "FATHER AND SON" by CAT STEVENS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He PRESSES PLAY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He listens. As he does, Groot crawls up onto the bed, and then onto his lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill offers him one of the ear buds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot holds it against his ear, amazed by the clarity of sound. Quill watches him, hearing the beauty of the song through Groot's face than the music itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And they sit there together, listening to the music, a ne father and son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nebula FLIES AWAY, sad, perhaps regretful, but forcing he chin up to brace against what's to come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora watches, THROUGH A WINDOW, as Nebula leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket sees something by the ashes.   His eyes alight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They came.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot sees COLORFUL FLASHING LIGHTS out of the window. pulls on Quill's shirt to show him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They go to get a better view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax and Rocket see Yondu's COSMIC ASHES PULSING AND SWIR out in space as, one by one, enormous RAVAGER SHIPS arriv around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They each FLASH SPECIFIC LIGHT SEQUENCES - and, with all ships together - it looks like fireworks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sent word to Yondu's old Ravager buddies and told them what he did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill comes up behind them with Groot, just as Gamora ent Quill smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a Ravager funeral.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin sees it from here. He SCREAMS with joy, and he sl his fist twice against his chest, a Ravager salute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STAKAR and Martinex watch him there, moved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't let us down after all, Cap'n.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, he did not, son. He did not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHARLIE-27, an enormous man, is wistful as he salutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fare thee well, old friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALETA is here, tears in her eyes, alcohol in her hand, an FEMALE RAVAGER CREW around her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you in the stars, Yondu Udonta.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the Guardians all watch, enchanted by the majesty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't chase `em away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even though he yelled at `em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And was always mean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he stole batteries he didn't need.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill is surprised - what? And then he looks at Rocket, a little animal who doesn't know the rules of how to be any more than a young boy whose tribe sold him into slavery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Groot is on Gamora's shoulder. He reaches for Drax, takes him. Baby Groot YAWNS and nuzzles into Drax's shoulder, falling asleep. Drax lovingly pats his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gamora looks at Drax and Groot, and Rocket, and Mantis, taking it all in, this strange family of hers. She turns Quill, staring at him with love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just some unspoken thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill wraps his arm around her and she sinks into him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mantis smiles and becomes teary and GASPS, overwhelmed, a she looks out the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is. And so are you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn back to the window and they stand there togethe our Guardians of the Galaxy, watching the Ravager funeral the colorful dust of an old friend dance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the shape of the dust seems to form something very cl to an ARROW.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rocket sees this and he cries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SURRENDER is PLAYING HERE. Kraglin has had a version of Yondu's fin implanted in his head. He looks nervously dow at the arrow on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to WHISTLE. It just flips around like a dead fis

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He WHISTLES again, and it FLIES UP, hitting a wall, and f back down again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He WHISTLES again, and it ZIPS AWAY.   We HEAR A SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin looks around the corner where Drax is sitting, th ARROW IMPALED in his chest, yelling in agony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kraglin looks around, hoping no one saw him there, and he tries to slink away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MORE CREDITS as SURRENDER CHORUS KICKS IN: Mommy's all ri Daddy's all right, they just seem a little weird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stakar looks sad, serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a shame it takes a tragedy like losing Yondu to bring us all back together. But I think he'd be proud if he knew we were working as a team again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over Stakar we see this incredibly motley crew - MARTINEX CHARLIE-27, ALETA, who is holding MAINFRAME (a robotic he in a cage), and the mouthless, wormlike KRUGARR,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What say we steal some shit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I MISSED you guys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krugarr makes a hex symbol and TWO COLORFUL THUMBS-UP BUR in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell. Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ayesha sits on a bench, brooding, disheveled and still furious. The Chambermaid cautiously approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: High Priestess, the Council is waiting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are perturbed I have wasted our resources.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chambermaid smiles politely, nods slightly, agreeing circumspect manner. Ayesha stares across the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When they see what I have created here, their wrath will dissipate, though it will be some time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Chambermaid looks where Ayesha is looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is not just another birthing pod, ma'am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That, my child, is the next step in our evolution: more powerful, more beautiful, and more capable of destroying the Guardians of the Galaxy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large, human-sized cocoon stands where Ayesha stares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I shall call him... `Adam'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill is standing in the bedroom doorway, looking down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude, seriously, you got to clean up your room. It's a complete mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We REVEAL a gawky ADOLESCENT GROOT, hunched over, playing video game, in this very messy room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am Groot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not boring, man. You're boring. Once I got stuck on a planet where everyone was just lines and dots. I had to use geometry to get out of prison. Is that boring?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adolescent Groot shakes his head in disdain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what's boring? Not doing the dishes. What's boring is me tripping over your vines everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Adolescent Groot SIGHS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drax and I switched pants in the middle of that party last weekend. For no reason other than we're awesome and very much not boring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill starts to walk away then comes back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once I got a venereal disease that made me float for three days... Don't tell Gamora... it's dormant, but... If that's boring then, I guess I'm boring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not boring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Groot ROLLS HIS EYES and makes an exasperated sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's boring is when you roll your eyes like that at me and make an exasperated sound like I'm an old, boring, stupid idiot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill thinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I know how Yondu felt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quill begins to CRY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yondu.
